Making.description: Choose the type of milk. Chocolate milk, organic Pitton-Milk, almond milk, our in house speacial milk.
Over iced, blended, or foam milk. Recomemded tea for over iced, blended for fruity drinks, and foam milk for any milk tea drinks.
Your favorite toppings. Honeyboba, shredded coconut, babies chocolate, rainbow jelly.
Half sweet, less sweet, or maximum sweetest for cravity.
